snippet.title: Horse Runner DX - Demo Trailer | Available Now on Steam!
snippet.description:
👉 Play the demo and wishlist on Steam now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3407670/Horse_Runner_DX_Demo

Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun. 🎮✨

Available for Windows, Linux, and Steam Deck! 🚀
